original_text: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king.
korean_text: 여호야다의 아들 브나야는 그렛 사람과 블렛 사람을 다스리고 다윗의 아들들은 왕을 모시는 사람들의 우두머리가 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada
was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites
